intro: Schismatoglottis celebica, commonly known as the Celebes Schismatoglottis, is a species of flowering plant native to the Indonesian island of Celebes. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, which includes many diverse and widely cultivated orchids. The plant is characterized by its sympodial growth habit, producing a rosette of fleshy, dark green leaves. Its inflorescence consists of a single spike bearing several small, white to pale green flowers. Schismatoglottis celebica is often grown as a decorative houseplant due to its unique appearance and relatively low maintenance requirements.
